title: 【圖書館公告】中秋節【113.09.17 (二)】休館一日！ Library will be Closed for Mid-autumn festival on September 17, 2024
department: 圖書資訊處圖資服務組

author.department: 圖書資訊處圖資服務組

content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 圖書資訊處圖資服務組 - 詹 - ipchan@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6813
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_休學學生_兼任教師_退休教職員_教職員眷屬
標題： 【圖書館公告】中秋節【113.09.17 (二)】休館一日！ Library will be Closed for Mid-autumn festival on September 17, 2024
日期： Sat, 14 Sep 2024 16:23:38 +0800

親愛的教職員生：

【113.09.17(二)】為中秋節，圖書館休館一天！

貼心提醒您：
＊倘有預約可取書者，請提前辦理借閱手續。
＊休館日還書，請利用還書箱。
＊東區圖書代還、視聽、館合NDDS等借書，請勿使用還書箱，謝謝您的合作。

如有任何問題，歡迎與我們連絡(03)890-6838或E-mail：library@mail.ndhu.edu.tw。

圖書資訊處　敬上

---------------------------------------------------------

Dear faculties and students,

Library will be Closed for Mid-autumn festival on September 17, 2024.

Notes:
1.You are advised to check out reserved books that are available.
2.Please make use of the Drop Box to return books during library’s closing hours.
3.Only books from National Dong Hwa University are allowed into the Drop Box. Multimedia or interlibrary materials are not allowed.

Should you have any questions, please contact us at 03-890-6838 or email to library@mail.ndhu.edu.tw.

Sincerely,
Office of Library and Information Services
National Dong Hwa University
